snippet: The deficit in February totaled $192.6 billion, up 0.1 percent from a year ago, the Treasury announced.
abstract: Treasury Dept says February deficit was $192.6 billion, up 0.1 percent from year ago; deficit for budget year is $353 billion, down 8.7 percent from same period in 2015, but figure is expected to rise.
lead_paragraph: The deficit in February totaled $192.6 billion, up 0.1 percent from a year ago, the Treasury announced.

headline.print_headline: February Deficit Up Slightly From Year Ago, U.S. Reports
headline.main: February Deficit Up Slightly From Year Ago, U.S. Reports
